title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 912.1 - Periodic inspection required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 912.1 - Periodic inspection required

State Regulations

All railroad (see ยง
912.3
) or street railroad
corporations operating within the First District are directed and required
during each calendar year to make periodical inspections of their respective
elevated structures and bridges within the First District, such inspections to
be made under the supervision of competent and responsible officials or
employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
912.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
